LanguageData.CarpetRed.Label: Красный ковер
LanguageData.CarpetRed.Description: Plush carpet in a lovely rose hue.
LanguageData.CarpetGreen.Label: Зеленый ковер
LanguageData.CarpetBlue.Label: Синий ковер
LanguageData.CarpetBlue.Description: Toe-hugging plush carpet in a cool blue color.
LanguageData.MetalTile.Label: Металлочерепица
LanguageData.MetalTile.Description: Metal tiles, for that spaceship look.
LanguageData.PavedTile.Label: Асфальтовая плитка
LanguageData.PavedTile.Description: Utilitarian concrete tiles. Quick to move around on, but not very pretty.
LanguageData.StoneTile.Label: Каменная плитка
LanguageData.StoneTile.Description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling.
LanguageData.Concrete.Label: Бетон
LanguageData.Concrete.Description: Quick-poured concrete. Fast to walk on, but quite ugly. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this.
LanguageData.SmoothStone.Label: Гладкий камень
LanguageData.SmoothStone.Description: Smoothed natural stone. Fast to walk on and beautiful to look at.
